channel.title: [554] CarlScape [554] Full Combat, PvP, Drops, D Claws specials, range, + more!
channel.description:
LINKS KEEP BREAKING, FFS! Download if uppit is down: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=DO7448SY (Server) Client: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=8B8A4R0S Megashare: Server: http://www.MegaShare.com/1576889 Client: http://www.MegaShare.com/1576892 [b][size=50pt]THIS IS NOT MINE! ALL CREDIT GOES TO CARL FROM GOOGLE! I JUST THOUGHT THAT MOPAR WOULD GET A LITTLE BETTER WITH 503+ DEOBS!!!!!!!!!!![/size][/b] 0% credits to me
554 server base. I'm bored of computer so i will stop working on it alot i might get on sometime to add things when i have nothing to do. [COLOR="Red"][SIZE="4"][B]If you dont like it, dont post, i dont give a shit if you dont like it so just stfu[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR] [B]Features:[/B] Player Vs Player Special Attack Death Food Equip Item UnEquip Drop Item Switch Item Walking Chat Pvp item degrade Some stand, walk, run anim for weapon Ranging D bolt e Spec Magic on Player Melee Attack and Defence bonus Range Attack and Defence bonus Magic Attack and Defence bonus Elysian and Divine spirit shield bonus Ground item Pickup item Single combat area Pking drop (other players item) Special attack bar Special using special attack bar Banking deposit and withdraw Setstring, show weapon name and bonus NPCS Potions (super set, ranging, saradomin brew, super restore) Stats restore delay Item on item to make potion doses, (1) + (1) = 2 lol. For every potion released Fixed saving and loading Characters Made Player vs Npc (need npc mask, working on it) Shop, sell and buy Trading (working) Grand Exchange Equipment interface almost full Npc combat Npc attack back [B][COLOR="Red"][ VIDEOS ][/COLOR][/B] Video #1: [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2z6w7sh&s=3]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2z6w7sh&s=3[/url] Video #2: (banking, npc, setstring) [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2j43v35&s=3]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2j43v35&s=3[/url] Video #3: (trade, yes kinda bugged) [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=k1vw3b&s=3]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=k1vw3b&s=3[/url] Video #4: (pking with myself -.- melee only and veng) [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=5z4ap&s=3]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=5z4ap&s=3[/url] Video #5: (Grand Exchange) [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=1060a2s&s=3]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=1060a2s&s=3[/url] [SPOILER="Pvp Pics"][url=http://img25.imageshack.us/i/111111111111t.png/][img]http://img25.imageshack.us/img25/2706/111111111111t.png[/img][/url] [URL=http://img215.imageshack.us/i/222222222222222.png/][IMG]http://img215.imageshack.us/img215/3070/222222222222222.png[/img][/URL] [/SPOILER] This pvp item stand only 15-30mins in combat after their time they disaspear. [SPOILER="Pvp item degrad"][URL=http://img10.imageshack.us/i/333333333cyn.png/][IMG]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/3293/333333333cyn.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img10.imageshack.us/i/444444444444t.png/][IMG]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/4582/444444444444t.png[/img][/URL] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER="Stand walk animation"][URL=http://img402.imageshack.us/i/555555555555555555.png/][IMG]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/6533/555555555555555555.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img3.imageshack.us/i/khgkgh.png/][IMG]http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/6448/khgkgh.png[/img][/URL] [/SPOILER] 1st pic is d bolt spec than its magic shortbow to ags spec, delay like rs. [SPOILER="Ranging"][URL=http://img26.imageshack.us/i/77777777777777h.png/][IMG]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/9611/77777777777777h.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img525.imageshack.us/i/888888888888.png/][IMG]http://img525.imageshack.us/img525/29/888888888888.png[/img][/URL] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER="Magic on Player"][URL=http://img530.imageshack.us/i/hfdfhhhf.png/][IMG]http://img530.imageshack.us/img530/6516/hfdfhhhf.png[/img][/URL] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER="Pking drop"] [URL=http://img168.imageshack.us/i/dropitem.png/][IMG]http://img168.imageshack.us/img168/4823/dropitem.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img199.imageshack.us/i/dropq.png/][IMG]http://img199.imageshack.us/img199/5837/dropq.png[/img][/URL] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER="Single Combat"] [URL=http://img3.imageshack.us/i/multicombat.png/][IMG]http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/3276/multicombat.png[/img][/URL] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER="Special bar"] Pic of the special bar : [url=http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/5481/specj.png]http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/5481/specj.png[/url] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER="NPC"] [URL=http://img403.imageshack.us/i/npccc.png/][IMG]http://img403.imageshack.us/img403/2845/npccc.png[/img][/URL] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER="Shop"][URL=http://img201.imageshack.us/i/shopss.png/][IMG]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/6126/shopss.png[/img][/URL] [/SPOILER] [SPOILER="Trading"] [URL=http://img407.imageshack.us/i/tradek.png/][IMG]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/7711/tradek.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img524.imageshack.us/i/trade2.png/][IMG]http://img524.imageshack.us/img524/669/trade2.png[/img][/URL] [/SPOILER] [COLOR="Red"][B] NPCS:[/B][/COLOR] The npcs do attack back, they have animation, delay, death emote [B][COLOR="Red"]BUGS:[/COLOR][/B] You will finds some bugs, please dont pm me to fix them you can do it yourself its not hard at all. [B][COLOR="Red"]Some little tips:[/COLOR][/B] :: shop :: ge :: string interfaceId childId :: interface interfaceId :: item itemId itemAmount [B][COLOR="Red"]Download links:[/COLOR][/B] [B]Server: [/B] [url=http://uppit.com/v/T96VYIMI]http://uppit.com/v/T96VYIMI[/url] [B]Client:[/B] [url=http://uppit.com/v/IRWMCUSH]http://uppit.com/v/IRWMCUSH[/url] / it work perfectly for me so it should for you. [B]Cache(in your C drive):[/B] [url=http://uppit.com/v/D4C1HTR3]http://uppit.com/v/D4C1HTR3[/url] [B]Cache should be:[/B] C:/cache554 > runescape > (cache files)
This is not mine, just a thing I thought would benefit the moparscape community. Carl quit the computer anyways and he doesnt give a shit about his server. I TAKE 0% CREDITS!

item.title: [554] CarlScape [554] Full Combat, PvP, Drops, D Claws specials, range, + more!
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:32, topic:311111”]Pk3r, learn to read.[quote author=Clockwise27 link=topic=407562.msg3010771#msg3010771 date=1256760251]
Lol, look at rules when you first enter mopar, says no posting things that aren’t yours without permission.

Edit: Infact says don’t post things that aren’t yours.
[/quote]
It doesn’t say anything about giving credits to the creator, it says DON’T POST THINGS THAT AREN’T YOURS.

And saying that you havn’t got any rep doesn’t mean that that’s the reason you posted it.
@JMood, rep++[/quote]

Rep is just a number and doesn’t change my opinion in any way, you didn’t really need to rep me for my post on the truth.

Also &zand there was no need to make a second post on the same thing you could of just given him the links.

Read full topic
